attributes.action: Tackle the huge Price rises imposed by British Gas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Anyone interested?
 
  Imagine a company making £571 million profit (07) from its customers, a 77% increase in prices since 2003 and now presuming to use the same customers as a 'cash cow’ by increasing a 70% increase 2008/9. Then imagine the disengaged Chairman suggesting that those who are hardest hit should, "Wear two jumpers"
 
Would you expect an outcry? 

  Isn’t it time to consider appropriate action against the blatant profiteering? Is it time to consider a boycott?  Who will be the voice of the voiceless? Who will challenge the blatant profiteering, and speak for those who will face misery this winter. 
 
Meanwhile: The Facts
 
 *  British Gas Profits last year £571 million
 *  £478 million shared out to parent company shareholders – Centrica
 *  77% rise in charges since 2003
 *  A further 70% rise predicted 2008/9
 
Is Anyone Listening?  
Then, please sign the Petition!
 
 
Adrian.
